articles.author: By Sophie Haslett For Daily Mail Australia
articles.title: Talented home baker sets the Internet alight with simple recipe for baked salted caramel cheesecake - Daily Mail
articles.description: A talented home baker has set the Internet alight with her simple recipe for a baked salted caramel cheesecake - and you'll only need to get your hands on a few pantry staples to replicate it.
articles.content:
The recipe for the cheesecake (pictured) is surprisingly simple, despite having several steps
INGREDIENTS
For the salted caramel
270g soft caramels, shop bought (Werther's Originals work well)
1/4 cup cream
1 teaspoon sea salt flakes
